settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Avoid Allergic Reactions
settings.text: Table & Twine’s allergy-friendly meal subscription service takes the stress out of eating. No longer will you need to worry about accidentally consuming your allergen and experiencing uncomfortable symptoms.

settings.title: Eliminate Time-Consuming Label Examination
settings.text: Whether you’re vegetarian or gluten-free, you’re probably well-acquainted with nutrition labels. Though it’s good to be aware of what’s in your food, scrutinizing ingredient lists can be tedious. That’s why the chefs at Table & Twine do the scrutinizing for you, meticulously curating allergy-free recipes.

settings.title: Everyone Can Eat at the Same Time
settings.text: From dairy-free pasta to vegetarian soup, all Table & Twine meals only require 15 minutes to prepare. Because of this, families can enjoy meals together – even if they’re eating different dishes.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose an Allergy-Friendly Meal Kit in Raleigh?
settings.text: Our chefs care about food and the role it plays in our lives. That’s why they take time to develop allergy-friendly meals that are both delicious and convenient. Other benefits of Raleigh allergy-friendly meal kits include:

settings.heading: What Makes Table & Twine Different?
settings.text:
Table & Twine is dedicated to providing a truly convenient meal kit delivery service in Raleigh. Unlike our competitors, we don’t simply ship pre-measured ingredients to your door and expect you to do the work. 

Instead, our talented chefs handle the more technical aspects of cooking, preparing up to 90% of every meal. So, when it’s time for dinner, you’ll just need to add the finishing touches. What’s even better? Many of our foods can be cooked in their original packaging, which cuts down on clean-up time.

settings.title: Are nut-free meals just for people with nut allergies?
settings.text: With the help of Table & Twine, you can have a single entrée dinner ready in less than 15 minutes. This saves hours of cooking and cleaning at the end of the day so you can relax.

settings.title: Can I pick the recipes in my nut-free meal service?
settings.text: Our dinner meal kits are individually priced. The cost covers meal planning, ingredient sourcing, and the majority of the prep work. At an affordable cost, you can have an unforgettable and personalized dining experience.

settings.title: What will I get in my Table & Twine nut-free meal?
settings.text: Using our online ordering system, you can order as many meals as you’d like, while supplies last. If you are ordering for a large group, we suggest exploring our Family Meals or Small Groups menu.

settings.title: Will I benefit from a nut-free meal plan in Charlotte?
settings.text: Our dinner meal kits are individually priced. The cost covers meal planning, ingredient sourcing, and the majority of the prep work. At an affordable cost, you can have an unforgettable and personalized dining experience.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
